      • getOwnerPeerRootXDIArcs

        public Iterator<XDIArc> getOwnerPeerRootXDIArcs()
        Description copied from interface: MessagingContainerFactory
        Returns a list of all owner peer roots of the MessagingContainers this MessagingContainerFactory can create. Not all MessagingContainerFactorys may support this.
        Specified by:
        getOwnerPeerRootXDIArcs in interface MessagingContainerFactory
